DLG.p: Finally, %DOREEN% needs to create a user account for you, the administrator. This will be the first user account in this installation, and it will have administrator privileges. You can create additional accounts later.
You will not be able to do anything useful with %DOREEN% unless you create at least this one account, so please don't skip this step.

FIELD.p: The login name is set when the account is created and cannot be changed later.
The "real name" is merely descriptive and is publicly displayed with the user's activity, for example in ticket changelogs.
Ticket mail is sent to this address, which is not shown publicly.
